ygData.subject: Re: Equipment Check
ygData.msgSnippet: I liked my combine long sword right up until lvl 20 where I got a barbed leather whip and a chitin shell shield for bashing, much higher numbers than the
ygData.messageBody:
I liked my combine long sword right up until lvl 20 where I got a barbed leather whip and a chitin shell shield for bashing, much higher numbers than the polished Tommy but no magical strength. In the first bubble of lvl 26 I went for the Bone bladed claymore, for 300 pp I am not sure if I paid too much or not. Not have ever used my 2h slash I ended up dumping 33 practices into it and just now as I approach the half way mark of 27 is it maxing out, (the numbers are great, double attack for 37 each J). As far as armor, the higher up in lvl I have been forsaking armor class for + agility, +strength, + dex, what I have given up in A/C is made up more than double with dodges, and parries.


Its all personal preference, I like the agility and mobility, but still keep an A/C of 532

FattyBear

Hello All
I have several equipment based questions to ask.

1) I have both a mino axe and a FS longsword which should I be using?

2) Considering the above weapons what is the next step up in weapons?

3) How much should I except to pay to jump up to the weapon suggested in
question 2?

4) Taking into account that I am currently level 16(bubble from 17th) and I
currently have:
2 Onyx Earrings
Spiked Leather Collar
Leather Mask
Small Ringmail Helm
2 Silver Amber Rings (+2 str)
Banded Arms
Leather Gloves
2 Banded Bracers
Leather Shoulderpads
Bronze Breastplate
Bronze Cloak
Bronze Leggings
Leather Belt
Banded Boots
Shiny Brass Shield
Am I at where most paladins (untwinked) at this level?

5) What types of armor should I be looking for?

6) How much does a BS mantle sell for ?

7) Anyone on Cazic Thule they would like to sell?


Well that is alot for this time. Thanks for your advice in advance.

Silvermyst
